p: In this assignment, you will have an engaging and personalized discussion experience with your peer students. Using this article as food for thought, share your idea on the subject matters, and lead the group of colleagues into consensus. Your credit will be given after writing 3 original posts and 3 replies about other students' posts.

In this new multimedia discussion tool (RichReview), the power of voice+gesture commenting will allow you to have rich discussion experiences similar to face-to-face meetings. The speech commenting feature is powered by the state-of-the-art speech recognition engine, allowing you to express your idea fast and naturally by speaking. You can also create visual gestures over the page to indicate which part of the texts you are talking about.
